How is the flu spread?

The flu is spread through respiratory droplets when people with the flu cough, sneeze or talk. These droplets can land in the mouth or nose of people nearby and cause them to become sick. You can also get the flu by touching a surface or object that has the flu virus on it and then touching your mouth, nose or eyes.
